get.summary: Targets returns the set of scrape targets that are configured

parameters.name: state
parameters.description:
state is the state of targets to returns

 - STATE_ANY_UNSPECIFIED: STATE_ANY_UNSPECIFIED unspecified
 - STATE_ACTIVE: STATE_ACTIVE target active state
 - STATE_DROPPED: STATE_DROPPED target dropped state

TargetHealth.description:
- HEALTH_UNKNOWN_UNSPECIFIED: HEALTH_UNKNOWN_UNSPECIFIED unspecified
 - HEALTH_GOOD: HEALTH_GOOD healthy target
 - HEALTH_BAD: HEALTH_BAD unhealthy target
TargetHealth.title: Health are the possible health values of a target

TargetsRequestState.description:
- STATE_ANY_UNSPECIFIED: STATE_ANY_UNSPECIFIED unspecified
 - STATE_ACTIVE: STATE_ACTIVE target active state
 - STATE_DROPPED: STATE_DROPPED target dropped state
TargetsRequestState.title: State represents the current state of a target

value.title: value is the value for the label name

profilestorev1alpha1Label.title: Label is a key value pair of identifiers

labels.title: labels are the grouping of labels

v1alpha1LabelSet.title: LabelSet is a group of labels

lastError.title: last_error is the error message most recently received from a scrape attempt

lastScrape.title: last_scrape is the time stamp the last scrape request was performed

lastScrapeDuration.title: last_scrape_duration is the duration of the last scrape request

url.title: url is the url of the target

v1alpha1Target.title: Target is the scrape target representation

targets.title: targets is a list of targets

v1alpha1Targets.title: Targets is a list of targets

targets.title: targets is the mapping of targets

v1alpha1TargetsResponse.title: TargetsResponse is the set of targets for the given requested state
